stitch marker - tapestry needle size - one finished measurements - circumference 19½ merry and bright hat no 202137 - height 8½ design by mary pranica pattern gauge - in stockinette stitch 18 sts and 28 row = 4 blocked colorful and warm the merry and bright hat plays with pattern and stranded knitting interesting to knit and fun to wear abbreviations co cast on k knit k2tog knit 2 stitches together p purl pm place marker rem remaining repeat repeat round s round s st s stitch es complimentary pattern blue sky fibers 9 chart a c1h1art b8 7 6 4 3 2 1 18 36 17 35 16 34 15 33 14 32 13 31 12 30 29 11 28 10 27 9 26 8 25 7 24 6 23 5 22 4 21 3 20 2 19 1 1 18 17 8-st repeat * repeat the directions between the asterisks as 16 many times as indicated 15 chart a key 14 special methods b 13 c 12 stranded color d 11 10 a method of color knitting in which two or more yarns are e 9 worked at the same time with yarns not in use stranded g 8 loosely across the wrong side of the piece 7 6 notes change to double pointed needles when stitches no 5 longer fit comfortably on circular needle 4 3 hat 2 1 with a co 88 sts pm and join to work in the round being 11-st repeat careful not to twist sts rnds 1-5 *k2 p2 repeat from * to end of round chart b key round 6 k a work chart a once a k2tog work chart b once b cut yarn leaving 8 tail thread through rem sts and pull c to close d f finishing g weave in ends block as desired no stitches care instructions hand wash or dry clean wash in tepid water using a mild soap do not twist shape and p o box 88 minneapolis mn 55011 usa blueskyfibers com ©2021 this pattern is copyrighted material and under the copyright laws of the united states you may use this dry flat on a towel store your little treasure neatly pattern for your own personal use or enjoyment but may not edit publish copy or folded after all it may be a family heirloom commercially exploit this pattern in any
